title: Cat Girl Fashion Challenge

thumbnailDetails.alt: Cat Girl Fashion Challenge Play Online

headings.text: How to Play Cat Girl Fashion Challenge
More Fashion Games for Angela Fans

controls: Mouse or Touch: Tap icons, drag clothing onto Angela, and hit the big Preview button to present your look.
content.howToPlay:
When the round starts, you'll be matched with an opponent. The level tells the current theme, so keep those colors and vibes in mind while you browse in your wardrobe. The vertical toolbar at the right opens earrings, necklaces, bags, shoes, and full outfits; swipe the item carousel if you need more choices. Select pieces to put onto Angela, and they snap perfectly into place. Feel free to mix, match, and swap as much as you like because nothing locks in until you click preview.

Once both stylists are ready, the pink platforms glide into a backyard catwalk (or snowy plaza or neon club; each level looks different). The judging trio then flips their score paddles. A thumbs-up lights a star under Angela's name; a thumbs-down does nothing. Collect more stars than the opponent to win the round. Keep winning, and Angela will strut through every season in the calendar, all the way to the secret Galaxy Gala finale.
content.developer: Created and published by FreezeNova, specialists in quick-load, kid-friendly web games that work smoothly on desktops, tablets, and phones.

fullContent: Homeâ€º Dress UpCat Girl Fashion ChallengeBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenAngela the Cat has always loved two things: trying on cute outfits and showing them off to anyone who will watch. Cat Girl Fashion Challenge lets you enter Angela's wardrobe and her world of friendly rivalry and glittering spotlights. Each round pairs Angela with a stylish challenger on a runway. You become Angela's personal stylist, digging through closets packed with dresses, shoes, and sparkly accessories. Submit the look and see how your opponent dressed. Three judges wave their paws in approval or disappointment), declare a winner, and push Angela on to fresh fashion themes: Evening Elegance, Casual Chill, Back-to-School, E-Girl, Christmas sparkle, spooky Halloween, pastel Easter, and even a few secrets that unlock later. It's a quick, upbeat girl game, and the best part is that you can hop in for a few minutes or binge through every theme without downloads, sign-ups, or surprise paywalls.ControlsMouse or Touch: Tap icons, drag clothing onto Angela, and hit the big Preview button to present your look.How to Play Cat Girl Fashion ChallengeWhen the round starts, you'll be matched with an opponent. The level tells the current theme, so keep those colors and vibes in mind while you browse in your wardrobe. The vertical toolbar at the right opens earrings, necklaces, bags, shoes, and full outfits; swipe the item carousel if you need more choices. Select pieces to put onto Angela, and they snap perfectly into place. Feel free to mix, match, and swap as much as you like because nothing locks in until you click preview.Once both stylists are ready, the pink platforms glide into a backyard catwalk (or snowy plaza or neon club; each level looks different). The judging trio then flips their score paddles. A thumbs-up lights a star under Angela's name; a thumbs-down does nothing. Collect more stars than the opponent to win the round. Keep winning, and Angela will strut through every season in the calendar, all the way to the secret Galaxy Gala finale.DeveloperCreated and published by FreezeNova, specialists in quick-load, kid-friendly web games that work smoothly on desktops, tablets, and phones.More Fashion Games for Angela FansIf one runway isn't enough, check out Angela All Season Fashion on OnlineGames.io. Instead of facing rivals, you guide Angela through a year-round makeover spree, spring florals, summer beachwear, autumn sweaters, and winter sparkles, unlocking new wardrobes as you progress. It's the perfect sequel once you've mastered every challenge in the Cat Girl Fashion Challenge and still crave fresh outfits for everyone's favorite pink-furred style star.This article was updated on May 9, 20251 Player2DCatCuteDress UpFreeGirlHTML5KidsMobileMouse
